Apply functions over windows that advance through data.

RollingFunctions.jl © 2017-2023 by Jeffrey Sarnoff
in three different ways
  • rolling
  • tiling
  • running
optionally specifying
  • weights
  • padding
  • pad placement
with these data sequences
  • datastreams

some approaches

summarizeaggregate
condensecombine
